column1: #text=I was riding in the bike lane going to work when I felt my tire pop and give out on me .
#text=I quickly pulled over to the side walk and got off my bike to take a good look at it .
#text=A rock was embedded into my tire tube .
#text=I pried the rock out with my fingers and got my patch kit from my backpack .
#text=I made sure there was no other debris in the tire and then applied the glue .
#text=I stuck the patch onto the glue and made sure it was a nice fit and held well .
#text=After that i pumped my tire back up with air and checked to make sure it would hold up to the rigors of the road .
#text=After that I hopped back on my bike and slowly rode to work careful of anymore rocks .
#text=This is why i always carry around my repair kit .
